Plot: Marlowe's about to give up on a completely routine case when he finds himself in the wrong place at the right time to get caught up in a murder that leads to a ring of jewel thieves, another murder, a fortune-teller, a couple more murders, and more corruption than your average graveyard.
Characters: Moose Malloy, Philip Marlowe, Lindsay Marriott, Jessie Florian, Anne Riordan, Mrs. Lewin Lockridge Grayle, Jules Amthor, Laire Brunette, Dr. Sonderborg, Lewin Lockridge Grayle, Detective-Lieutenant Carl Randall, Nulty, Chief John Wax
Setting: Los Angeles, California (United States), California (United States)
